script.title: DT To Table
script.description: Move data from a DT bucket into a BigQuery table.
instructions: Ensure your user has access to the bucket.
Provide the DT bucket name to read from.
Provide the path of the files to read.
Each file is synchronized to a unique table.  Use a view or aggregate select.

field.name: bucket
field.description: Name of bucket where DT files are stored.

field.name: paths
field.description: List of prefixes to pull specific DT files.

field.name: days
field.description: Number of days back to synchronize.

field.name: hours
field.description: Number of hours back to synchronize.
